Synopsis:
The most legendary barbarian of all time returns this summer. Having thrived and evolved for eight consecutive decades in the collective imagination - in prose and illustrated, on the big screen and small, in games and in all imaginable shapes and properties - Conan's exploits in the Hyborian Age now come to life and had not ever seen a massive action-adventure movie in 3D.

A search begins as a personal vendetta for the fierce Cimmerian warrior will quickly become an epic battle that faces huge and horrific monsters rivals. Against all hope of victory, Conan will realize that it is the only chance of the great nations of Hyboria against the invasion of an evil supernatural.

Production notes:
- Based on the mythical character created by Robert E. Howard
